      • deployAndGetReceipt

        TransactionReceipt deployAndGetReceipt(byte[] data)
        deploy contract to fisco bcos node and get transaction receipt.
        参数:
        data - encoded transaction data
        返回:
        transaction receipt

      • deployOnly

        void deployOnly(java.lang.String abi,
                java.lang.String bin,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Object> params)
         throws ABICodecException
        deploy contract to fisco bcos node only without receive any response.
        参数:
        abi - contract abi, which could be obtained by compiling solidity contract.
        bin - contract binary, which could be obtained by compiling solidity contract.
        params - contract construct parameters
        抛出:
        ABICodecException

      • deployAndGetResponse

        参数:
        abi - contract abi, which could be obtained by compiling solidity contract.
        signedData - signed and encoded constructor data
        返回:
        transaction response @See TransactionResponse

      • deployByContractLoader

        TransactionResponse deployByContractLoader(java.lang.String contractName,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.Object> params)
                                    throws ABICodecException,
                                           TransactionBaseException
        deploy contract to fisco bcos node and get response by contract name. The contract loader will load the transaction abi and bin information.
        参数:
        contractName - contract name.
        params - contract construct parameters
        返回:
        transaction response
        抛出:
        ABICodecException
        TransactionBaseException

      • deployByContractLoaderAsync

                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Object> params,
                                 TransactionCallback callback)
                          throws ABICodecException,
                                 NoSuchTransactionFileException
        deploy contract to fisco bcos node and get response by contract name asynchronously. The contract loader will load the transaction abi and bin information.
        参数:
        contractName - contract name.
        params - contract construct parameters
        callback - transaction with callback function
        抛出:
        ABICodecException
        NoSuchTransactionFileException
